```{r}

FBfunc <- function(data){
  y=data
for (i in 1:length(data)){
  if (data[i] %% 3 == 0 & data[i] %% 5 == 0) y[i]="FizzBuzz" else if (data[i] %% 3 == 0) y[i]="Fizz" else if (data[i] %% 5 == 0) y[i]="Buzz" else y[i]=data[i] 
return(y)
}
}
FBfunc <- Vectorize(FBfunc)
x=c(1:100)
FBfunc(x)

```
